name: Dorbins of the Reborn Refuge
description: Often found in nearby Wandererâ€™s Refuge, the Dorbins of the Reborn Refuge are known for their stewardship of unripe Fruit Folk, and assisting with incubation when necessary. Now biding their time, secretly bestowing life upon inanimate things, they look towards the future with a glint in their eye. Their future is bright. The only question: what comes next?
